snippet: In a small space in a strip mall, Burger Records looks to build a cultural movement.
abstract: Burger Records is both store and independent record label in Fullerton, Calif, that serves as nerve center of fourth-wave garage rock; aims to build cultural movement from tiny, limited resources.
lead_paragraph: In a small space in a strip mall, Burger Records looks to build a cultural movement.

headline.seo: Burger Records Develops Bands and More
